SEARCH
Package it.astromark.rating.service

Interface MarkService

All Known Implementing Classes:
MarkServiceImpl
public interface MarkService
Service interface for managing mark-related operations. Provides methods for retrieving, calculating, and managing marks, ratings, and reports.

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • getMarkByYear

      List<MarkResponse> getMarkByYear(@NotNull @NotNull UUID studentId, @PastOrPresent @PastOrPresent Year year)
      Retrieves a list of marks for a specific student in a given year.
      Parameters:
      studentId - the UUID of the student
      year - the year to filter marks
      Returns:
      a list of `MarkResponse` objects representing the marks of the student for the specified year Pre-condition: The `studentId` and `year` must not be null. The student associated with the `studentId` must exist. Post-condition: Returns a list of marks for the specified student and year.

    • getAverage

      Double getAverage(@NotNull @NotNull UUID studentId, @PastOrPresent @PastOrPresent Year year)
      Calculates the average mark for a specific student in a given year.
      Parameters:
      studentId - the UUID of the student
      year - the year to filter marks
      Returns:
      a double representing the average mark of the student for the specified year Pre-condition: The `studentId` and `year` must not be null. The student must have at least one mark in the specified year. Post-condition: Returns the average mark for the specified student and year.

    • getReport

      SemesterReportResponse getReport(@NotNull @NotNull UUID studentId, @PositiveOrZero @PositiveOrZero Short year, Boolean semester)
      Retrieves a semester report for a specific student and year.
      Parameters:
      studentId - the UUID of the student
      year - the year of the report, must be positive or zero
      semester - the semester of the report (true for first semester, false for second semester)
      Returns:
      a `SemesterReportResponse` object representing the semester report Pre-condition: The `studentId` and `year` must not be null. The `year` must be positive or zero. The student must exist. Post-condition: Returns the semester report for the specified student, year, and semester.

    • viewReport

      SemesterReportResponse viewReport(@NotNull @NotNull Integer reportId)
      Retrieves the details of a specific report by its ID.
      Parameters:
      reportId - the ID of the report
      Returns:
      a `SemesterReportResponse` object representing the report details Pre-condition: The `reportId` must not be null and must correspond to an existing report. Post-condition: Returns the details of the specified report.

    • getRatings

      List<RatingsResponse> getRatings(@NotNull @NotNull Integer classId, @NotEmpty @NotEmpty String subject, @NotNull @NotNull LocalDate date)
      Retrieves ratings for a specific class, subject, and date.
      Parameters:
      classId - the ID of the class
      subject - the subject of the ratings
      date - the date to filter ratings
      Returns:
      a list of `RatingsResponse` objects representing the ratings Pre-condition: The `classId`, `subject`, and `date` must not be null. The class must exist. Post-condition: Returns a list of ratings for the specified class, subject, and date.

    • getEveryRatings

      List<RatingsResponse> getEveryRatings(@NotNull @NotNull Integer classId, @NotEmpty @NotEmpty String subject)
      Retrieves all ratings for a specific class and subject.
      Parameters:
      classId - the ID of the class
      subject - the subject of the ratings
      Returns:
      a list of `RatingsResponse` objects representing the ratings Pre-condition: The `classId` and `subject` must not be null. The class must exist. Post-condition: Returns a list of all ratings for the specified class and subject.

    • create

      MarkResponse create(@NotNull @NotNull MarkRequest mark)
      Creates a new mark entry.
      Parameters:
      mark - the `MarkRequest` containing the details of the mark
      Returns:
      a `MarkResponse` object representing the created mark Pre-condition: The `mark` must not be null and must contain valid details. Post-condition: A new mark entry is created and returned.

    • update

      MarkResponse update(@NotNull @NotNull MarkUpdateRequest mark, @NotNull @NotNull UUID studentId)
      Updates an existing mark for a specific student.
      Parameters:
      mark - the `MarkUpdateRequest` containing the updated details of the mark
      studentId - the UUID of the student whose mark is being updated
      Returns:
      a `MarkResponse` object representing the updated mark Pre-condition: The `mark` and `studentId` must not be null. The student and mark must exist. Post-condition: The specified mark is updated and returned.

    • delete

      boolean delete(@NotNull @NotNull Integer id)
      Deletes a mark by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the mark to be deleted
      Returns:
      true if the mark is successfully deleted, false otherwise Pre-condition: The `id` must not be null. The mark must exist. Post-condition: The specified mark is deleted if it exists.
